MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30pm due to third party damage on our underground cable network at 9 Laggary Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:03pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
